name: Slimy Envasion
description:
the jam's page.

You are a blue slime in a suit, your goal is to survive the red slimes invasion with the help of your teammates!

you will start with three teammates! How ever, you can get more by killing the enemies, there is a small chance of getting an enemy on your team once they get killed!

Settings:

In game settings includes:

  • Sound effects volume.
  • Music volume.
  • Screen shaking.
